entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
